The length of Part 1 is 0.75, the width is 0.75, and the height is 0.0469. The length of Part 2 is 0.2812, the width is 0.0469, and the height is 0.0469. The final shape has a length of 0.75, a width of 0.75, and a height (including the taper) of 0.1334.</description>

Arc 2: Draw an arc starting at [0.7312, 0.0], with a midpoint at [0.7445, 0.0055], and ending at [0.75, 0.0187]. 4. Line 2: Draw a line from [0.75, 0.0187] to [0.75, 0.2812]. 5. Arc 3: Draw an arc starting at [0.75, 0.2812], with a midpoint at [0.7445, 0.2945], and ending at [0.7312, 0.3]. 6. Line 3: Draw a line from [0.7312, 0.3] to [0.0187, 0.3]. 7. Arc 4: Draw an arc starting at [0.0187, 0.3], with a midpoint at [0.0055, 0.2945], and ending at [0.0, 0.2812]. 8. Line 4: Draw a line from [0.0, 0.2812] to [0.0, 0.0187]. Loop 2: Central Hole Loop_2 defines a circular cutout (hole) in the rectangular prism. Perform the following steps to create this loop: 1.
